column1: I am a data scientist at an AI startup. We are trying to decide which of the different foundation models we want to use. What can Arthur do for my team?
I am the CTO of a law firm. We are using dozens of document classification and clustering algorithms at scale and we are struggling to keep track of everything. What can Arthur do for my business?
I am a compliance officer at a bank. We are using LLMs in a customer-facing chat app but are worried about the risks involved. What can Arthur do for my team?
